youtube.title: How a Heart Attack is Treated: Angioplasty and Stent Animation
youtube.description: Watch this step-by-step 3D animation showing how doctors treat a heart attack using a stent and angioplasty. Understand coronary artery blockages and the medical procedures used to restore blood flow to the heart.
